titles: Proposals for raising a colledge of industry of all useful trades and husbandry with a profit for the rich, a plentiful living for the poor and a good education for youth : which will be advantage to the government by the increase of the people and their riches.
author: Bellers, John, 1654-1725.
publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,
notes: "To the children of light" signed: John Bellers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Communism --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
